
project(ImGui)

add_library(ImGui STATIC)

set(IMGUI_PLATFORM_IMPL "imgui_impl_${IMGUI_PLATFORM_BACKEND}")
set(IMGUI_RENDERER_IMPL "imgui_impl_${IMGUI_RENDERER_BACKEND}")

target_sources(ImGui
	PRIVATE
    "imgui/imgui.cpp"
    "imgui/imgui_demo.cpp"
    "imgui/imgui_draw.cpp"
    "imgui/imgui_tables.cpp"
    "imgui/imgui_widgets.cpp"
    "imgui/backends/${IMGUI_PLATFORM_IMPL}.cpp"
    "imgui/backends/${IMGUI_RENDERER_IMPL}.cpp"

  PUBLIC
    FILE_SET imGuiIncludes
    TYPE HEADERS
    FILES
      "imgui/imconfig.h"
      "imgui/imgui.h"
      "imgui/imgui_internal.h"
      "imgui/imstb_rectpack.h"
      "imgui/imstb_textedit.h"
      "imgui/imstb_truetype.h"
      "imgui/backends/${IMGUI_PLATFORM_IMPL}.h"
      "imgui/backends/${IMGUI_RENDERER_IMPL}.h"
)

target_link_libraries(ImGui INTERFACE SkapeEngine)

target_include_directories(ImGui PUBLIC "imgui" "imgui/backends" ${IMGUI_ADDITIONAL_INCLUDES})
